item.title: limitador-operator
item.description:
Description

Kubernetes operator for managing Limitador instances, a rate limiting service to protect your APIs.

  • https://github.com/Kuadrant/limitador-operator/
  • https://github.com/Kuadrant/limitador/

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
limitador-operator-controller-manager default âŒ â€” 15 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– limitador-operator-controller-manager

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (15)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
